\n\t\tEnter your Airtop API key. You can:
Enter your Airtop API key. You can get your API key from the [Airtop Dashboard](https://portal.airtop.ai/api-keys).
		
		**How to get your API key:**
		1. Go to the [Airtop Dashboard](https://portal.airtop.ai/api-keys)
		2. Sign in to your account
		3. Navigate to API Keys section
		4. Create a new API key or copy an existing one
		5. Paste the key here
Starts a new browser session in Airtop.
Ends an existing browser session in Airt: Ends an existing browser session in Airtop.
Opens a new window within a session, opt: Opens a new window within a session, optionally navigating to a URL.
Captures a screenshot of the current win: Captures a screenshot of the current window.
Query a page to extract data or ask a qu: Query a page to extract data or ask a question given the data on the page.
Scrape a page and return the data as Mar: Scrape a page and return the data as Markdown.
Extract content from paginated or dynami: Extract content from paginated or dynamically loaded pages.
Execute a click interaction in a specifi: Execute a click interaction in a specific browser window.
Type into a browser window at the specif: Type into a browser window at the specified field.
Push an existing file to one or more ses: Push an existing file to one or more sessions, making it available for use in file inputs or downloads.
Moves mouse pointer over an element in t: Moves mouse pointer over an element in the browser window.
Make a custom API call to a specific end: Make a custom API call to a specific endpoint
Name of a profile to load into the sessi: Name of a profile to load into the session.
List of Chrome extension IDs from Google: List of Chrome extension IDs from Google Web Store.
Enable Airtop-provided proxy. If disable: Enable Airtop-provided proxy. If disabled, configure a custom proxy.
How long before the session times out du: How long before the session times out due to inactivity (1-10080 minutes). Default: 10.
Select an active Airtop session to use f: Select an active Airtop session to use for browser automation
URL to open in the new window. Default:: URL to open in the new window. Default: https://www.google.com
Fixed dimensions for the browser window. Affects live view size.
Custom resolution in format \"widthxheig: Custom resolution in format "widthxheight" (e.g., "1440x900"). Leave blank to use selected resolution above.
When to consider the page loaded. Defaul: When to consider the page loaded. Default: load
Maximum time to wait for page loading. D: Maximum time to wait for page loading. Default: 30 seconds

Optional ID for tracking this request: Optional ID for tracking this request
How to return the screenshot. Default: b: How to return the screenshot. Default: base64 for viewport, url for page/scan
What part of the page to capture. Defaul: What part of the page to capture. Default: auto
Maximum height of screenshot. Will scale: Maximum height of screenshot. Will scale down if needed, preserving aspect ratio.
Maximum width of screenshot. Will scale: Maximum width of screenshot. Will scale down if needed, preserving aspect ratio.
Image quality for JPEG compression. High: Image quality for JPEG compression. Higher = better quality. Note: Feature in development.
Enable advanced visual analysis features: Enable advanced visual analysis features for better page processing
Stop screenshot if it costs more than th: Stop screenshot if it costs more than this. Leave blank for default limit.
Stop screenshot if it takes longer than: Stop screenshot if it takes longer than this. Leave blank for default timeout.
The question or instruction for Airtop t: The question or instruction for Airtop to answer about the current page.
An optional ID for your internal trackin: An optional ID for your internal tracking.
JSON schema defining the structure of th: JSON schema defining the structure of the output. Must be valid JSON schema format.
Whether to include visual analysis of th: Whether to include visual analysis of the page (default: auto)
Improve scraping performance by optimizi: Improve scraping performance by optimizing URLs (default: auto)
Abort if the credit cost exceeds this am: Abort if the credit cost exceeds this amount. Set to 0 to disable.
Abort if the operation takes longer than: Abort if the operation takes longer than this. Set to 0 to disable.
If enabled, Airtop will attempt to load: If enabled, Airtop will attempt to load more content from pagination, scrolling, etc. (default: false)
Optional ID to track this request on you: Optional ID to track this request on your end.
Instructions on what to extract and how: Instructions on what to extract and how to paginate (e.g. "Navigate through 3 pages and extract titles and prices").
Optional ID to track this request.
Describe the scrollable area (e.g. \"res: Describe the scrollable area (e.g. "results container in middle of page").
Choose how to navigate through pages (de: Choose how to navigate through pages (default: auto)
Balance between speed and accuracy (defa: Balance between speed and accuracy (default: auto)
Describe the element to click (e.g. \"Lo: Describe the element to click (e.g. "Login button").
The type of click to perform (default: l: The type of click to perform (default: left click).
Describe the scrollable area to search w: Describe the scrollable area to search within (e.g. "main content area").
Controls how much of the page is visuall: Controls how much of the page is visually analyzed (default: auto).
How to select from multiple matches (def: How to select from multiple matches (default: auto).
How to partition screenshots for analysi: How to partition screenshots for analysis (default: vertical).
Maximum number of scrolls in scan mode (: Maximum number of scrolls in scan mode (default: 50).
Delay between scrolls in scan mode (defa: Delay between scrolls in scan mode (default: 1000ms).
Percentage of overlap between screenshot: Percentage of overlap between screenshot chunks (default: 30).
Wait for page navigation to complete aft: Wait for page navigation to complete after clicking (default: false).
When to consider navigation complete (de: When to consider navigation complete (default: load).
Max seconds to wait for navigation (defa: Max seconds to wait for navigation (default: 30).
The text to type into the browser window: The text to type into the browser window.
Clear the input field before typing text: Clear the input field before typing text.
Press Enter key after typing text.
Press Tab key after typing text (after E: Press Tab key after typing text (after Enter if both enabled).
Wait for page navigation to complete aft: Wait for page navigation to complete after typing (default: false).
Max time to wait for navigation after ty: Max time to wait for navigation after typing (default: 30).
Condition to consider navigation complet: Condition to consider navigation complete (default: load).
Controls how much of the page is analyze: Controls how much of the page is analyzed to find the input (default: auto).
Percentage of overlap between visual chu: Percentage of overlap between visual chunks (default: 30).
Describe the scrollable container (e.g.,: Describe the scrollable container (e.g., "table body", "product list").
Cancel if this limit is exceeded. Set 0: Cancel if this limit is exceeded. Set 0 to disable.
Cancel if exceeded. Set 0 to disable.
Select a file that has been uploaded to: Select a file that has been uploaded to Airtop
Select one or more sessions to make the: Select one or more sessions to make the file available on. Leave empty to make available to all sessions.
Describe the element to hover, e.g. \"th: Describe the element to hover, e.g. "the search box input in the top right corner".
Wait for page navigation to complete aft: Wait for page navigation to complete after hovering (default: false).
